tool_description: AI to detect an age of people on photos
name: Age Recognition by Everypixel
title: Age Recognition by Everypixel

api_list.name: Age Recognition
api_list.description: Age Recognition API detects an age of people on photos. Model is trained on few datasets up to 300 000 images of people of different gender, age and nationality.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://age-recognition-by-everypixel.p.rapidapi.com/age_recognition"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "age-recognition-by-everypixel.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://age-recognition-by-everypixel.p.rapidapi.com/age_recognition"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "age-recognition-by-everypixel.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
